Articles.Content:
I would like to turn on the Start Burn Time indicator on the navball however I have looked in the setting both in game and the start menu and can find no option to enable it. I am playing on the Xbox one s and have all the DLC. I also have advanced tweakables on

Edited June 25, 2020 by Bobbyy60

While we got the extended burn information (the stage splits, and red level if you don't have enough Delta-V to perform the burn), it doesn't appear that the start burn time functionality has been added to the console version.
Thanks for the answer, I thought that may be the case as I couldn't find the setting anywhere.
